content: blomidon hiking hat by ana watts art-by-ana blomidon hiking hat by ana watts art-by-ana description the blomidon hiking hat is perfect for the outdoor adventurer and city dweller alike this cabled hat has a lot of stretch yet fits snug and comfortably on your head to keep you warm it is named a fter the picturesque area of blomidon in nova scotia canada e xperience level advanced beginner gauge 28 stitches and 33 row over 10cm 4 using main cable pattern body of hat using 4mm needles with dk yarn h at is intended to be worn with 2 inches/5 centimetres of negative ease abbreviations k - knit yo - yarn over p - purl c4f - cable worked over 4 stitches place first 2 pm - place marker stitches onto a cable needle and hold to the front m1 - make one knit the next two stitches then knit the 2 stitches k2tog - knit two together that are on the cable needle p2tog - purl two together c2f - cable worked over 2 stitches place first sl1 k2 psso - with yarn in back slip the first stitch onto a cable needle and hold to the front stitch knitwise knit two stitches pass the 1st knit the next stitch then knit the stitch on the slipped stitch over both of the knit stitches cable needle copyright 2015 all rights reserved �1 blomidon hiking hat by ana watts art-by-ana sizes newborn baby toddler/child youth/teen adult small/medium adult medium/large approximate head size newborn - 33-35cm / 13-14 baby - 40-45cm / 16-18 child/toddler - 45-48cm / 17-18 youth/teen - 46-51cm / 18-20 adult small/medium - 50-55cm / 21-22 adult medium/large - 55-59cm / 22-23 approximate finished measurements without stretching hat is intended to be worn with 2 /5cm of negative ease newborn - 30 5cm/12 circumference 14cm/5 1/2 high baby - 35 5cm/14 circumference 15 5cm/6 high child/toddler - 38cm/15 16 5cm/6 1/2 high youth/teen - 40 5cm/16 circumference 19cm/7 1/2 high adult small/medium -43cm/17 circumference 21cm/8 1/4 high adult medium/large - 46cm/18 circumference 22cm/8 3/4 high materials 3 5mm size 4 40cm 16 circular knitting needle 4 0mm size 6 40cm 16 circular knitting needle or size needed to obtain gauge 4 0mm size 6 set of double pointed knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge one stitch marker one cable needle one darning needle approximate yarn requirements in dk weight yarn suggested yarn art-by-ana dreaming dk 100g 231 yards 80% superwash merino/10% cashmere/ 10% nylon in charcoal grey other dk weight yarns may be used but required quanti ties may vary newborn - 27g/62 yards baby - 35g/81 yards **to make a slouchy version of this hat add a few child/toddler - 40g/92 4 yards extra pattern repeats in the body section youth/teen - 49g/113 yards t his will require additional yarn adult small/medium - 60g/139 yards adult medium/large - 68g/157 yards copyright 2015 all rights reserved �2 blomidon hiking hat by ana watts art-by-ana p attern
